derivation: probably akin to G3588 (οἷος), G3739 (οἷος), and G3745 (οἷος);
kjv_def: so (as), such as, what (manner of), which
strongs_def: such or what sort of (as a correlation or exclamation); especially the neuter (adverbially) with negative, not so
outline: 1. what sort of, what manner of, such as
